title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.8 - Prohibited operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.8 - Prohibited operation

State Regulations
(a) Defective boiler. No person shall suffer or permit a defective boiler to be
operated. (b) Excessive pressure or
temperature. No person shall suffer or permit a boiler to be operated at a
pressure exceeding the maximum allowable working pressure or at a temperature
exceeding the maximum allowable working temperature stated in the latest
certificate of inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
